Producer Price Index by Industry: Major Household Appliance Manufacturing (PCU3352233522)
Jul 2023: 165.114 | Index Dec 2003=100 | Monthly | Updated: Aug 11, 2023

Observation:

Jul 2023: 165.114 (+ more)   Updated: Aug 11, 2023
Jul 2023:  165.114  
Jun 2023:  165.760  
May 2023:  165.861  
Apr 2023:  164.261  
Mar 2023:  163.347  
View All

Units:

Index Dec 2003=100,
Not Seasonally Adjusted

Frequency:
